domain

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Null
    Overview:
    This class is the container for the squares and the pieces similar to physical monopoly board.

      • getSquareByName

        public domain.square.Square getSquareByName(java.lang.String name)
        Requires:
        name is not null. squares is not null.
        Effects:
        Returns the particular square whose name is specified by given string. Returns null if the given name is not found.

      • buyProperty

        public boolean buyProperty(Player currentPlayer,
                           domain.square.Square sq)
        Requires:
        currentPlayer and sq are not null.
        Effects:
        Returns true if sq is a title deed square and it's owner is null and currentPlayer's balance is bigger than title deed's cost. Otherwise, returns false and does nothing.
        Modifies:
        sq, currentPlayer

      • upgradeTitleDeed

        public boolean upgradeTitleDeed(Player currentPlayer,
                                TitleDeedSquare sq)
        Requires:
        currentPlayer and sq are not null and currentPlayer owns sq.
        Effects:
        Returns true if upgrade is available and currentPlayer has the relevent upgrade money. Otherwise returns false and does nothing.
        Modifies:
        currentPlayer, sq

      • majorityOwner

        public boolean majorityOwner(Player player,
                             java.lang.String color)
        Requires:
        player is not null, color is valid color name.
        Effects:
        Returns true if player owns at least all but one square of the given color. Otherwise, returns false.
        Modifies:
        -

      • getNextUnowned

        public domain.square.Square getNextUnowned(domain.square.Square sq,
                                           int direction)
        Requires:
        sq and squares are not null and direction is either 1 or -1.
        Effects:
        Returns the next square whose owner is null. Otherwise, returns null.
        Modifies:
        -
